class.name: PopupButton
class.brief_description: A button that shows some [Popup] when pressed.
class.description: [PopupButton] shows a designated [Popup]-derived node when it's pressed. It can be used to show menus or configuration panels. Note that by default no popup exists. Implement [method _create_popup] to create a popup when it's needed. Alternatively, the first [Popup] node added as a child of [PopupButton] will automatically be set as its own popup.

method.name: _about_to_popup
method.description: Called before the popup appears. Use it to setup the popup contents.

method.name: _create_popup
method.description: Called when the popup was requested, but does not yet exist. Return a [Popup]-based node that will appear when this button is pressed. The node will automatically be added as a child of this button.

method.name: _post_popup
method.description: Called after the popup appears. Use it for post-popup operations, like grabbing focus of a child node.

method.name: _setup_popup_position
method.description: Called when the popup is about to be show. Set the popup's position, and optionally size. If not overridden, the popup will appear at default position under the button.

method.name: get_generic_popup
method.description: Returns the [Popup] associated with this button. For classes inheriting [PopupButton], prefer their own, more specific methods, like [method MenuButton.get_popup].

method.name: show_popup
method.description: Shows the popup, while calling all related callbacks. Prefer this over using [method Window.popup].

signal.name: about_to_popup
signal.description: Emitted when the [Popup] of this button is about to show.
